job.title: Machine Learning/ Data Science/ Data Engineer
job.description: <p><strong><u>** Multiple Roles - Immediate Interview &amp; Start **</u></strong></p><p><br></p><p><strong>W2 (Preferred). </strong></p><p><br></p><p><strong><u>HOSPITALITY INDUSTRY CLIENT (FORTUNE COMPANY)</u></strong></p><p><br></p><p><strong>Role:&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Machine Learning/ Data Science/ Data Engineer</strong></p><p><strong>Location:&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;San Francisco Bay Area (Remote work until pandemic)</strong></p><p><strong>Duration:&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Long Term Contract</strong></p><p><br></p><p><strong>Job Description:</strong></p><p>● 5+ years of industry experience or a PhD + 2 years industry experience in applied</p><p>machine learning.</p><p>● Strong coding skills in Python/Java/Scala or equivalent</p><p>● Experience with distributed data processing tools like Hive, Spark, Airflow and</p><p>popular ML frameworks like Tensorflow or Pytorch is preferred</p><p>● Solid understanding of engineering best practices and complexities of models in</p><p>production</p><p>● Experience developing and productionizing machine learning models is a plus</p><p>● Experience with Docker, Kubernetes, Spark is a plus</p><p>● Experience with distributed data processing tools like Hive, Spark, Airflow is a plus</p><p>● Industry experience building end-to-end Machine Learning Infrastructure a big</p><p>plus</p><p><br></p><p>If you are interested to pursue this opportunity, please send your updated resume to Sam@agiledatapro.com</p>
